function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased number of noise complaints during the lockdown","Impact":"Potential increase in community annoyance and stress levels, leading to reduced well-being","Mitigation":"Implement noise control measures, provide community awareness, and enforce noise regulations","Technologies":"Noise monitoring devices, sound barriers, and noise-canceling technologies","People":"Community residents, vulnerable populations, and individuals sensitive to noise","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, and building developers"},{"Description":"Statistically significant increase in tweets with noise complaints during the lockdown","Impact":"Indication of heightened community dissatisfaction with noise levels, potentially leading to social unrest","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to identify specific noise sources and address them, engage with the community to understand their concerns, and develop noise reduction strategies","Technologies":"Social media analytics tools, noise monitoring equipment, and community engagement platforms","People":"Community residents, social media users, and local authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, local government, and community organizations"}]}
